name: ATHENIAN RHAPSODY DEMO
description:
Athenian Rhapsody is a comedic indie RPG game by Nico Papalia. In this game, you're tasked with adventuring through the world of Athens by either befriending or fighting your way through each interaction.

This game is currently in development, but you can follow along for updates at https://twitter.com/AthenianRhapso1

Check out the Kickstarter here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/nicopapalia/athenian-rhapsody?ref=user_menu

Please keep in mind this is a demo, if there are any bugs or strange things please let me know! The game has a long way to go, please let me know if you enjoyed.

CONTROLS:

Arrow Keys: Move  Space: Interact/Sprint  Backspace: Back  Enter: Pause  Shift: Fullscreen (also has controller support!)
